s:patient c/o 3 weeks h/o Blood. NKDA. patient is a white female proofreader aged 57 ys. she reports having no more than one drink a day she does not smoke o:Height 62 in, Weight 112 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18, Chest X-Ray showed bilateral pleural thickening more marked on the left side, CT Chest revealed thickening of the skin overlying the mass and non specific ground glass appearance in the upper lung fields B/L, Biopsy of mass confirmed the diagnosis of lymphangiosarcoma a:Lymphedema p:administered Doxorubicin - 60 mg/m2 IV single dose, repeat q 21d, performed Chest X-Ray, CT Chest, Biopsy of mass, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
